alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Grady; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 17 at 7:06PM CDT until March 17 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Grady County in central Oklahoma... Southwestern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Eastern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 705 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Union City, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Western Oklahoma City, El Reno, Yukon, Bethany, Mustang, Warr Acres, Tuttle, Piedmont, Union City, Minco, Woodlawn Park and Richland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
